It tugs at your heart strings and in the end it is very satisfying.There were so many moments in the game where I was caught off guard or surprised by some action\, in many cases shouting out loud or jerking back in my seat startled.  I’ve never played a game that makes me feel this involved and part of the story.This game is a sequel\, the story had to do something drastic to not be too repetitive with the first game.  I initially was not thrilled when I reached the “moment” in the game which I think the negative reviews are focused on\, but as the game went on the more I enjoyed the story and the creative direction that the developer and game designers took.  The game is definitely worth the purchase and play through.  I intend to play through it again to find anything I missed the first time.If there was one thing that could have been better is the gameplay controls\, reloading with R2 is unusual.  I usually reload guns with square.  I also got tired of the infected encounters and the AI was not very smart.  You could hide in stealth mode and 6 NPC’s would see dead bodies and walk right up to the same spot for an easy kill.
